text: 2007 FIFA U-17 World Cup was held in South Korea from 18 August to 9 September. From this tourament the teams were raised from 16 to 24. == Venues == Seoul Suwon Goyang Cheonan Seoul World Cup Stadium Suwon Civic Stadium Goyang Stadium Cheonan Stadium Capacity: 66,806 Capacity: 24,670 Capacity: 41,311 Capacity: 30,000 Ulsan Changwon Gwangyang Jeju Ulsan Stadium Changwon Civic Stadium Gwangyang Football Stadium Jeju World Cup Stadium Capacity: 19,050 Capacity: 27,085 Capacity: 13,496 Capacity: 42,256 == Teams == Confederation Qualifying Tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) Host nation AFC (Asia) AFC U-17 Championship 2006 CAF (Africa) 2007 African Under-17
